text: People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true.
The only thing we're allowed to do is to believe.
A lesson without pain is meaningless.
If you don't take risks, you can't create a future.
If I don't wield the sword, I can't protect you.
In this world, there are very few people who actually trust each other.
Why is it that the beautiful things are entwined more deeply with death than with life?
I mustn't run away. I mustn't run away.
Whatever happens, happens.
Every human has their own unique way of living.
The only thing all humans are equal in is death.
People's feelings are memories that transcend time.
The only ones who should kill are those who are prepared to be killed.
No matter where you go, everyone's connected.
We are all connected to the vast network of information.
I wanted to tell you that wherever you are in the world, I will be searching for you.
The thing is, I don't really want to die. I just want the pain to stop.
I don't know what love means.
A real hero always finds a way for justice to be served.
I would rather be a brainless monkey than a heartless monster.
If you really want to be strong, stop caring about what your surrounding thinks of you.
I believe it's my destiny to destroy Muzan.
Yare yare daze...
Just because you have psychic powers doesn't make you any less human.
I finally get a bouquet and it's a goodbye present. That's depressing.
